channel.title: David Tyler's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on David Tyler's Blog

item.title: Bringing emulation into the 21st century
item.description: What happens when you apply 21st century application design to the emulation of old arcade machines? How much can we improve the emulation community?

item.title: Experiments in 8080 static/jit compilation
item.description: Is it possible to recompile 8080 assembly into CLR IL? Can that be extended to deliver the Space Invaders arcade machine as a dynamically recompiled CLR binary?

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software engineering manager who still gets to spend a decent chunk of his spare time working on real programming projects. This site contains some articles covering things I’ve found interesting. Github LinkedIn

item.title: NES Emulator in Rust
item.description: Writing a NES Emulator in Rust with no unsafe code and only compile time guarantees. Does rust provide good value when writing an emulator?
